Controls
  • Move menu (or map) cursor: Arrow keys / WASD
  • Confirm / Select location: Enter / Space
  • Options menu (on map screen): Esc / Backspace
Options

The options menu contains a couple of options for people more interested in the story than the combat.

  • Extra HP: Gives each character 5 extra HP, making combat much more forgiving.
  • Never lose: Prevents characters' HP from dropping to zero.
